TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 258
TEI.2.document_title: David G Burnet to Stephen F Austin, 11-22-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: David G. Burnet to Austin, Cincinnati, Ohio, September 22, 1829. Power of attorney authorizing Austin to petition for enlargement of Burnet's contract to settle colonists. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 258
